title: User registration with valid birth data and city autocomplete
description: Verify that a user can successfully register by entering valid birth data and using city autocomplete to select their birth city. Ensure the birth chart is accurately calculated.

steps.description: Navigate to the Onboarding registration page.
Enter valid birth date and time.
Begin typing birth city and select a suggested city from autocomplete.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the registration completes successfully.
Verify that Solar, Lunar, and Rising signs are accurately calculated and displayed based on input data.
Verify city autocomplete suggestions are relevant and correctly list matching cities.

title: User registration with invalid birth data
description: Verify that the registration fails gracefully when entering invalid or incomplete birth data, with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the Onboarding registration page.
Enter incomplete or invalid birth date/time.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Verify the form does not submit and appropriate validation error messages are shown.
Enter an invalid or non-existent city name.
Verify city autocomplete does not accept invalid city and shows no suggestions or error.

title: Visual data security feedback during onboarding
description: Check that the onboarding flow provides clear, understandable visual feedback indicating data security and privacy during birth data entry.

steps.description: Open the Onboarding registration page.
Verify presence of visual indicators or messages describing data privacy and security.
Verify visual feedback is intuitive and accessible (e.g., contrast, readability).

title: Dashboard displays accurate real-time Mind, Body, Soul scores
description: Ensure the Dashboard retrieves and displays Mind, Body, and Soul scores correctly based on real-time planetary transit calculations.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Dashboard page.
Verify that Mind, Body, and Soul scores are displayed.
Verify scores correspond accurately to current planetary transit data.
Verify scores update upon data refresh or new planetary transit.

title: Dashboard displays action windows and AI-generated daily insights
description: Verify that the Dashboard shows actionable astrological insights, including caution periods and optimal timings, with AI-generated text.

steps.description: Access the Dashboard after login.
Verify AI-generated daily insights are displayed.
Verify that caution periods and optimal activity timings are clearly indicated.
Check insights are personalized based on user's birth chart and current planetary information.

title: Oracle Chat provides personalized astrological guidance
description: Test that Oracle Chat AI understands the user's natal map and chat history to provide empathetic, personalized, and context-aware guidance.

steps.description: Open Oracle Chat interface.
Initiate a conversation with personalized questions.
Verify responses reference the user's birth chart and previous conversations.
Verify tone is empathetic, mystical but grounded.
Ask follow-up questions related to prior context.
Verify the AI maintains context and provides coherent answers.

title: Oracle Chat handles unknown or ambiguous user queries gracefully
description: Check that the Oracle Chat AI provides polite, helpful guidance or fallback answers when encountering unclear or unsupported user queries.

steps.description: Open Oracle Chat interface.
Submit ambiguous or unclear questions.
Verify the AI responds politely with clarifying questions, suggestions, or fallback guidance.

title: Synastry feature accurately compares two natal charts
description: Verify that the Synastry module correctly processes and compares two user input natal charts and generates accurate compatibility analysis.

steps.description: Navigate to the Synastry page.
Input valid birth data for two individuals.
Submit for compatibility analysis.
Verify the compatibility analysis results match expected astrological interpretations.

title: Synastry radar chart renders correctly over six axes
description: Ensure the radar chart visualization is rendered appropriately displaying compatibility over six axes without graphical errors.

steps.description: Provide two valid natal charts in Synastry feature.
Verify the radar chart displays six axes as expected.
Check the graphical elements are clear, correctly labeled, and responsive.

title: Synastry input validation with invalid natal chart data
description: Verify the Synastry module properly handles invalid or incomplete birth data for one or both charts with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Synastry page.
Input invalid or incomplete birth data for one or both persons.
Attempt to submit compatibility request.
Verify submission is blocked and descriptive error messages are shown.

title: Simulated annual payment gate functions correctly during onboarding
description: Verify the simulated payment gate (Vigor Anual) is displayed appropriately in the onboarding funnel and accepts or rejects user intent without causing errors.

steps.description: Proceed through the onboarding flow to the payment gate step.
Verify the simulated annual payment offer is displayed.
Select 'accept' option and continue.
Verify onboarding progresses without errors and user intent is recorded.
Repeat and select 'reject' option.
Verify onboarding progresses without errors and user intent is recorded.

title: Frontend build and lint compliance
description: Ensure the frontend builds successfully without errors and passes linting checks to meet code quality standards.

steps.description: Execute the frontend build process.
Verify build completes successfully with no errors.
Run code linting on frontend source.
Verify no linting errors or warnings.

title: Backend build and lint compliance
description: Ensure the backend builds and runs without errors and passes code linting to conform to quality standards.

steps.description: Build and run backend (FastAPI) services.
Verify backend services start successfully with no runtime errors.
Perform lint checks on backend source.
Verify no linting errors or warnings.

title: SEO standards compliance on main pages
description: Check that main UI pages (Onboarding, Dashboard, Chat, Synastry) include necessary SEO elements like titles, meta descriptions, and headings.

steps.description: Access each main page: Onboarding, Dashboard, Oracle Chat, Synastry.
Verify page title includes relevant keywords.
Verify meta description tags are present and meaningful.
Verify presence of at least one h1 heading with relevant content.
